hero.title: Get Pre-Qualified for Your
hero.subtitle: Know exactly how much you can afford in minutes. No credit impact, no obligations, and completely secure.

fullPrequalification.title: Full Prequalification
fullPrequalification.description: Get an accurate loan estimate based on your complete financial profile

quickCalculator.title: Quick Calculator
quickCalculator.description: Get a rough estimate of your buying power with basic information

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Bank-level encryption protects your information. Your data is never shared without permission.

noCreditImpact.title: No Credit Impact
noCreditImpact.description: Soft credit checks won't affect your score. Shop confidently without worry.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Get your prequalification letter immediately. No waiting, no surprises.

step1.title: Share Your Information
step1.description: Tell us about your income, assets, and monthly debts. We'll guide you through each step.

step2.title: We Calculate Your Options
step2.description: Our system analyzes your profile and determines your maximum loan amount and monthly payment.

step3.title: Get Your Letter
step3.description: Receive your prequalification letter instantly. Use it to make offers with confidence.

applicationInProgress.title: Application in Progress
applicationInProgress.confirmStartOver: Are you sure you want to start over? This will delete your current progress.

quickCalculator.title: Quick Calculator
quickCalculator.text: Get a quick estimate of how much you might be able to borrow based on basic information.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: You don't have any saved applications
getStarted.text: Start your mortgage prequalification application today and find out how much you can afford.

accountCreation.title: Let's Get Started
accountCreation.subtitle: We'll save your progress so you can return anytime

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Let's start with your basic information. All fields are required unless marked optional.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.error: First name must be at least 2 characters

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.error: Last name must be at least 2 characters

ssn.label: Social Security Number (Optional)
ssn.description: Providing your SSN allows for a more accurate prequalification
ssn.warning: âš  Without SSN, we can't check your credit. Your estimate will be less accurate.

phone.label: Phone Number
phone.error: Please enter a valid phone number

email.error: Please enter a valid email address

toast.progressSaved: Progress saved! You can resume anytime.

employment.title: Employment & Income
employment.subtitle: This helps us calculate how much you can borrow

employer.label: Employer Name
employer.error: Employer and job title are required for employed status

selfEmployedNotice.title: Self-Employment Notice
selfEmployedNotice.message: Self-employment may require additional documentation such as tax returns and profit/loss statements.

toast.progressSaved: Progress saved! You can resume anytime.

assets.title: Assets & Down Payment
assets.subtitle: Show us what funds you have available for your home purchase

downPayment.label: How much can you put down?
downPayment.description: Based on estimated home price of ${{price}}

giftFunds.label: Gift Funds?
giftFunds.yes: Yes, receiving gift funds for down payment
giftFunds.description: Gift funds must be documented and cannot be a loan

summary.lowReservesWarning: Low reserves ({{months}} months). Lenders prefer 6+ months of payments in reserves.

toast.progressSaved: Progress saved! You can resume anytime.

debts.title: Monthly Debts & Obligations
debts.subtitle: Help us calculate your debt-to-income ratio. Only include minimum monthly payments.
debts.doNotIncludeText: utilities, groceries, gas, insurance, or other living expenses

noDebts.label: I have no monthly debts
noDebts.description: Check this if you have no recurring debt payments

rent.label: Do you currently pay rent?
rent.description: Rent is not counted in DTI for home purchase

summary.title: Debt Summary
summary.excellent: Excellent! Your DTI is well below the 36% limit
summary.good: Good! Your DTI is within standard limits
summary.fair: DTI above standard 36% limit but may qualify for FHA (43% limit)

payoffScenario.title: Debt Payoff Scenario
payoffScenario.message: Paying off ${{amount}}/month in debts would reduce your DTI to {{newDti}}%

toast.progressSaved: Progress saved! You can resume anytime.

property.title: Property & Loan Preferences
property.subtitle: Tell us about the home you want to buy

desiredHomePrice.label: Desired Home Price
desiredHomePrice.error: Home price must be at least $50,000

propertyType.label: Property Type
propertyType.multiUnitWarning: Multi-unit properties may require larger down payments (15-25%)

intendedUse.label: Intended Use
intendedUse.investmentWarning: Investment properties require 20-25% down, higher rates, and stricter qualification

firstTimeBuyer.label: First-time Homebuyer?
firstTimeBuyer.benefit: May qualify for special programs and benefits

toast.progressSaved: Progress saved! You can resume anytime.

review.title: Review Your Information
review.subtitle: Verify details before we generate your prequalification

documents.title: Optional: Upload Supporting Documents
documents.subtitle: Speeds up full approval later
documents.acceptedFormats: Accepted: PDF, JPG, PNG (Max 10MB each, 20 files max)

errors.invalidType: {{fileName}}: Invalid file type. Only PDF, JPG, and PNG are allowed.
errors.tooLarge: {{fileName}}: File too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

certifications.certifyTruth: I certify that the information provided is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge
certifications.authorizeCreditCheck: I authorize a soft credit check (won't affect credit score)
certifications.error: Please accept both certifications to continue

prequalificationAmount.title: Your Prequalification Amount
prequalificationAmount.subtitle: Based on your income, assets, and debts

loanComparison.subtitle: Different loan programs for your situation

calculator.title: Quick Affordability Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Get an instant estimate of what you can afford
calculator.noLoginRequired: No login or personal information required

monthlyDebts.label: Total Monthly Debts
monthlyDebts.description: Credit cards, car loans, student loans, etc.

results.title: Your Affordability Estimate

dti.label: Debt-to-Income Ratio
dti.fair: Fair - May qualify for FHA (43% limit)
dti.high: Too High - Consider reducing debts or increasing income

results.maxHomePrice: Maximum Home Price You Can Afford

warnings.highDti: Your DTI of {{dti}}% exceeds most lender limits (36-43%). Consider:

suggestions.payOffDebt: Pay off ${{amount}}/month in debts to reach 36% DTI
suggestions.lowerHomePrice: Consider a home price of ${{price}} or less

tips.title: Tips to Improve Your Affordability
tips.increaseDownPayment: Save for a larger down payment (20%+ avoids PMI)
tips.improveCredit: Improve credit score for better rates

cta.learnMore: Learn about the full prequalification process

calculator.disclaimer: This is an estimate only. Actual loan terms depend on credit score, employment history, and lender requirements.
